item.title: About me
item.author: sszynrae@gmail.com (clux)
item.description: My name is Eirik and this is an attempt to collect my thoughts. Why you are here is a mystery. Perhaps you are lost, or perhaps you’re my first stalker (welcome). At any rate, please remember that facebook or reddit isn’t going to recheck itself. History Below contains a brief summary and current status of various creative and dexterous endeavours that I am generally happy to have spent time on.
